import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import Logo from '../images/logo.svg' class Course extends React.Component{ state = { //User user_id: localStorage.getItem('user_id'), firstname: "", lastname: "", user_role:"", user_id: "", //Course course_name: "" } //Get User ID from Local Storage componentDidMount(state){ //User Info with Axios.get useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:4000/users/${state.user}`) .then(response => this.setState({ firstname: response.data[0].firstname, lastname: response.data[0].lastname, user_role: response.data[0].user_role, user_id: response.data[0].user_id })) .catch(error => console.log(error)) }, [state]) //Course Info with Axios.get useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:4000/courses/${this.props.id}`) .then(response => this.setState({ course_name: response.data[0].course_name } )) .catch(error => console.log(error)) }, [state]) } render(){ return(

{this.state.firstname} {state.lastname}

{state.user_role}

COURSES
{courseState.course_name}

Course Editor View

New Objective
Select what to search by
Option 1
Option 2
LEARNING OBJECTIVE DOMAIN BLOOM VERBS ACTIVITES
Latin has no def articles... Syntax Recall, Know 3 EDIT
Nouns vary by gender Syntax Recall, Know 5
Nouns vary by person Syntax Recall, Know 3
) } } export default Course;
